originalText.text: I've been using Courier Service by Mobile Messenger for many months. They have been a life saver, picking up and delivering my prescriptions when I couldn't get to the pharmacy. Always quick, reliable, responsive, and courteous. I highly recommend this service. Wish I could give them 10 stars!

Always quick, reliable, responsive, and courteous. I highly recommend this service. Wish I could give them 10 stars!

originalText.text: Excellent service, highly recommend. Friendly, professional, fast and efficient. Also well priced! I have used a lot of messengers in Manhattan and these guys are the best. They care about what they do and make sure it gets done right.

text.text: Excellent service, highly recommend. Friendly, professional, fast and efficient. Also well priced! I have used a lot of messengers in Manhattan and these guys are the best. They care about what they do and make sure it gets done right.

originalText.text:
I can't tell you how grateful I am for this company. Greta and her team are not only professional, but their service is one of the best courier experiences I have every had.

Long story short I was visiting NYC and accidentally left my bag at a restaurant and really needed to get my bag. They were helpful in their process to do that, as well as very patient with me when I accidentally gave them the wrong shipping info. I highly recommend this company. And these will be the only people I will use from here on out! You must give them a try! You won't regret it!

text.text:

Great magament and atmosphere
I thought so ,after one week with them i suddenly found out they have the most unprofessional group of office people one can have.Mike the head person is a complete jerk

originalText.text: So glad I found Mobile, 24 hours with a ton of messengers, couldn't do fashion week without them.  Not only are they fast on the phone and on the delivery, there is one thing that makes Mobile different from every other messenger I've ever used.  Mobile does not use bicycles for garment bags!  I cannot tell you how great it is.  Every other service takes my garment bag and folds and shoves it into a bike messenger bag, or stuffs it into a bike basket.  If I wanted my gowns destroyed I'd give them to my kids.  Mobile uses walking couriers and the garment bags are carried gently to their destination.  I appreciate this so much, I had to review them.  Keep up the good work guys.
